QuestData.Title: An Element of Danger
QuestData.Description: These nobles really think killing weasels is the mark of a good hunter? Ha!$b$bIt ain't hunting if there isn't a bit of danger involved. There are boars in these woods. That's more our speed out in the mountains! Why don't you kill some of those, then bring me their tusks as proof?
QuestData.CompletionText: Boars actually present some semblance of challenge to the hunter.
QuestData.RewardText: <Harold lets out a hardy laugh.>$b$bNow that's what I'm talking about!
